title: Spring Camp
description:
Our Spring Camp is designed for athletes to have fun in the sun while learning and redefining what skiing means to them. There will be a plethora of activities from games and technique work to races. We’re all about having fun and purely getting the kids “Out There”. Whether your kiddo is new or advanced in skiing we will have options for either level! Sign up for some hands on coaching along with plenty of smiles and miles! 
 Kids will engage in games, technique work, hot chocolate, goal setting, yoga on skis, and many more fun activities. Our camp runs from April 9th to the 11th for a total of 11 hours of training time.
